description: Alexander O. Howell studied in the USA, he is a Scottish scientist hired by Kagami for the research of tennyo legends. He speaks Japanese with a thick accent, a certified genius with a very high IQ and is a complete otaku. He works for Mikage International and provided advanced technology for the development of the C-Project. As the project progresses he soon finds out that things are not really going like he expected and tries to back out from it. The only thing keeping him from doing his job ends up being his own moral convictions.
name: Alexander O. Howell
